footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Ningguang | Update Date: 08/21/2022 | Editor: Effab1e#2963

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds__ - Best option when buffed by Bennett and playing on field even with 1 stack

__Skyward Atlas__ - Great general option, can be best for quickswap

__Memory of Dust__ - Best option when shielded without buffs, falls off with ATK buffs
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Kagura's Verity, Solar Pearl, Widsith__ - Generally strong catalysts; holds true for Ningguang

__Oathsworn Eye, Dodoco Tales__ - good F2P options
** **

fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Starshatter
**2)** Normal Attack: Sparkling Scatter
**3)** Elemental Skill: Jade Screen
